sources.title: The Lady in Question (1940)
sources.description: When a jury member takes in the defendant he couldn't convict, she has a bad influence on his son. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-lady-in-question-1940/

metadata.Plot: A juror in a murder trial takes pity on the recently acquitted defendant and invites her to move into his family's home and his son soon falls in love with her.
metadata.Writer: Lewis Meltzer, Marcel Achard, Jan Lustig
metadata.Actors: Brian Aherne, Rita Hayworth, Glenn Ford
